channel.title: Sound not working.
channel.description: I recently downloaded Black mesa and was excited to play. When I started playing I noticed that there was no sound. I checked if my sound was on, if my headphones were working, and if the sound was on in the settings. I didn't fix it, so I came to the forums. Please help!

item.title: Sound not working.
